    • Method Detail

      • getLightHSL

        public boolean getLightHSL(ApplicationParameters.Address address,
                           LightHSLModelClient.LightHSLStatusCallback callback)
        Get light HSL Lightness , Light HSL Hue and Light HSL Saturation states of an element.
        Parameters:
        address - Address to get lightness HSL state
        callback - Status callback
        Returns:
        true on success, false on fail or while another lightness command is in progress

      • setLightHSL

        public boolean setLightHSL(boolean reliable,
                           ApplicationParameters.Address address,
                           ApplicationParameters.Lightness lightness,
                           ApplicationParameters.Hue hue,
                           ApplicationParameters.Saturation saturation,
                           ApplicationParameters.TID tid,
                           ApplicationParameters.Delay delay,
                           LightHSLModelClient.LightHSLStatusCallback callback)
        Set the Light HSL Lightness state, Light HSL Hue state and the Light HSL Saturation state of an element.
        Parameters:
        reliable - true if we need status response
        address - Address to set Temperature Range state
        lightness - The target value of the Light HSL Lightness state
        hue - The target value of the Light HSL Hue state
        saturation - The target value of the Light HSL Saturation state
        tid - Transaction Identifier
        delay - Message execution delay in 5 millisecond steps
        callback - Status callback
        Returns:
        true on success, false on fail or while another lightness command is in progress

      • setLightHSL

        public boolean setLightHSL(boolean reliable,
                           ApplicationParameters.Address address,
                           ApplicationParameters.Lightness lightness,
                           ApplicationParameters.Hue hue,
                           ApplicationParameters.Saturation saturation,
                           ApplicationParameters.TID tid,
                           ApplicationParameters.Time transitionTime,
                           ApplicationParameters.Delay delay,
                           LightHSLModelClient.LightHSLStatusCallback callback)
        Set the Light HSL Lightness state, Light HSL Hue state and the Light HSL Saturation state of an element.
        Parameters:
        reliable - true if we need status response
        address - Address to set Temperature Range state
        lightness - The target value of the Light HSL Lightness state
        hue - The target value of the Light HSL Hue state
        saturation - The target value of the Light HSL Saturation state
        tid - Transaction Identifier
        transitionTime - Time as how long an element shall take to transition from a present state to a new state
        delay - Message execution delay in 5 millisecond steps
        callback - Status callback
        Returns:
        true on success, false on fail or while another lightness command is in progress

        Returns:

      • getLightHSLRange

        public boolean getLightHSLRange(ApplicationParameters.Address address,
                                LightHSLModelClient.LightHSLDefaultStatusCallback callback)
        Get the Light HSL Hue Range and Light HSL Saturation Range states of an element.
        Parameters:

        callback - Status callback
        Returns:
        true on success, false on fail or while another lightness command is in progress

      • setLightHSLRange

        public boolean setLightHSLRange(boolean reliable,
                                ApplicationParameters.Address address,
                                ApplicationParameters.Hue hueRangeMin,
                                ApplicationParameters.Hue hueRangeMax,
                                ApplicationParameters.Saturation saturationRangeMin,
                                ApplicationParameters.Saturation saturationRangeMax,
                                LightHSLModelClient.LightHSLRangeStatusCallback callback)
        Set the Light HSL Hue Range and Light HSL Saturation Range states of an element
        Parameters:
        reliable - true if we need status response
        address - Address to set HSL Hue and Saturation state
        hueRangeMin - The value of the Hue Range Min field of the Light HSL Hue Range state
        hueRangeMax - The value of the Hue Range Max field of the Light HSL Hue Range state
        saturationRangeMin - The value of the Saturation Range Min field of the Light HSL Saturation Range state
        saturationRangeMax - The value of the Saturation Range Max field of the Light HSL Saturation Range state
        callback - Status callback
        Returns:
        true on success, false on fail or while another lightness command is in progress
